meanings.definition: Looking messy or untidy in appearance.
meanings.sent1: She felt schlumpy in her wrinkled shirt.
meanings.sent2: The schlumpy room needed a good cleaning.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat looked schlumpy after playing in the mud.
meanings.sent4: The garden was schlumpy with weeds taking over.
meanings.sent5: The old car had a schlumpy exterior with peeling paint.

meanings.definition: A person who is dressed in a sloppy or unkempt manner.
meanings.sent1: The schlumpy at the party stood out with mismatched socks.
meanings.sent2: She felt like a schlumpy in her oversized sweater.
meanings.sent3: The schlumpy at the office always forgot his tie.
meanings.sent4: The schlumpy in the mirror made her realize she needed a new outfit.
meanings.sent5: The schlumpy in the movie was the comic relief character.

meanings.definition: To move or walk in a slouching or lazy manner.
meanings.sent1: He schlumpied along the sidewalk, dragging his feet.
meanings.sent2: The tired dog schlumpied back home after a long walk.
meanings.sent3: She schlumpied through the park, enjoying the sunshine.
meanings.sent4: The students schlumpied into the classroom after lunch.
meanings.sent5: The old man schlumpied down the street with his cane.
